Name: Freedom's eye
About the game: You have found yourself within this god forsaken prison. The people around you don't seem human... They don't look good or trustworthy. But you share the same goal, Freedom Gameplay Freedom's eye is a story-driven, point-and-click, adventure game, in which the player will have to: - survive the insanity - interact with the world inside the prison - do everything to escape - game lasts around 30min
